I:\\liveProject\\merafile-backend\\serve.serviceRawFile:
service: merafile-backend
frameworkVersion: ">=3.0.0"

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    BUCKET_NAME: merafile-uploads

functions:
  upload:
    handler: functions/handler.upload
    events:
      - http:
          path: upload
          method: post
          cors: true
          private: false

  generateDownloadUrl:
    handler: functions/handler.generateDownloadUrl
    events:
      - http:
          path: download
          method: get
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

resources:
  Resources:
    UploadsBucket:
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        BucketName: merafile-uploads
        CorsConfiguration:
          CorsRules:
            - AllowedHeaders: ["*"]
              AllowedMethods: ["GET", "PUT"]
              AllowedOrigins: ["*"]
